content: Singaporean ichthyologistThis biography of a living person **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help by adding reliable sources. Contentious material about living persons that is unsourced or poorly sourced **must be removed immediately** from the article and its talk page, especially if potentially libelous. *Find sources:* "Heok Hee Ng" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(September 2018)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Heok Hee Ng** is a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) [ichthyologist](/wiki/Ichthyologist) and researcher of [biodiversity](/wiki/Biodiversity) at the [Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum](/wiki/Lee_Kong_Chian_Natural_History_Museum) of the [National University of Singapore](/wiki/National_University_of_Singapore). He specialises in [Asian](/wiki/Asia) [catfish](/wiki/Catfish) systematics with particular focus on [sisoroid](/wiki/Sisoroidea) catfishes. As of 2018, Ng authored 14 species of [Siluriformes](/wiki/Siluriformes) ## Publications Ng has (co-)authored many publications. See Wikispecies below. ## Taxon described by him - See Category:Taxa named by Heok Hee Ng - Data related to Heok Hee Ng at Wikispecies This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Heok Hee Ng
